item.title: AcquireFlow - UK & Europe's startup acquisition marketplace for SaaS, ecom
item.description: AcquireFlow is the UK & Europe's free private acquisition marketplace for buyers and sellers of digital startups. We focus on the key areas of SaaS, e-commerce and Amazon FBA.
item.content:encoded: AcquireFlow is the UK & Europe's free private acquisition marketplace for buyers and sellers of digital startups. We focus on the key areas of SaaS, e-commerce and Amazon FBA.

item.title: Status Page by Spike.sh - Beautiful status pages for your website, app or store
item.description: Create beautiful and branded Status Pages for your website, app and store. üöÄ Fast setup - create your branded status page in 2 minutes. Share real time updates about incidents and planned maintenances. üéÅ Unlimited Status Pages for free in December!
item.content:encoded: Create beautiful and branded Status Pages for your website, app and store. üöÄ Fast setup - create your branded status page in 2 minutes. Share real time updates about incidents and planned maintenances. üéÅ Unlimited Status Pages for free in December!

item.title: Chatwoot 2.0 - Open source self-hosted customer engagement suite
item.description: Chatwoot is an open-source, self-hosted customer engagement suite. With Chatwoot, you can view and manage your customer data, communicate with them irrespective of which medium they use, and re-engage them based on their profile.
item.content:encoded: Chatwoot is an open-source, self-hosted customer engagement suite. With Chatwoot, you can view and manage your customer data, communicate with them irrespective of which medium they use, and re-engage them based on their profile.

item.title: Ycode - No-code web app builder where design meets function
item.description: Ycode is a visual development platform that enables creators to build custom web projects without having to hire developers. Ycode's mission is to make visual development as powerful as coding by hand‚Äîjust faster and more accessible.
item.content:encoded: Ycode is a visual development platform that enables creators to build custom web projects without having to hire developers. Ycode's mission is to make visual development as powerful as coding by hand‚Äîjust faster and more accessible.

item.title: Nanonets Table Extractor - Supercharged table extraction from any document
item.description: Save time, effort & resources spent on extracting tabular data from all kinds of documents with Nanonets‚Äô no-code table extractor. Automatically capture any ‚Äútable-like‚Äù structure, extract entire tables or just pull data from specific cells/rows/columns.
item.content:encoded: Save time, effort & resources spent on extracting tabular data from all kinds of documents with Nanonets‚Äô no-code table extractor. Automatically capture any ‚Äútable-like‚Äù structure, extract entire tables or just pull data from specific cells/rows/columns.

item.title: Quarkly 2.0 - No-code platform for creating websites and web apps on React
item.description: Have you been searching for a no-code fast-to-market builder in React with in-depth controls when needed? Are you interested in quickly creating a UI with a good balance between GUI and code input? Good news for you ‚Äî now you can use Quarkly.
item.content:encoded: Have you been searching for a no-code fast-to-market builder in React with in-depth controls when needed? Are you interested in quickly creating a UI with a good balance between GUI and code input? Good news for you ‚Äî now you can use Quarkly.

item.title: WeWeb 2.0 - The only no-code frontend builder that is backend agnostic
item.description: WeWeb is the fastest way to build production-ready web apps: - connect multiple data sources (e.g. Airtable, REST APIs, XANO, PostgreSQL) - visually design your frontend or add custom components (vue.js / react) - build no-code workflows or add custom JS
item.content:encoded: WeWeb is the fastest way to build production-ready web apps: - connect multiple data sources (e.g. Airtable, REST APIs, XANO, PostgreSQL) - visually design your frontend or add custom components (vue.js / react) - build no-code workflows or add custom JS

item.title: Stytch - User infrastructure for modern applications
item.description: Stytch is a full stack authentication and authorization platform, whose APIs make it simple to seamlessly onboard, authenticate and engage users. Improve security and user experience by going passwordless.
item.content:encoded: Stytch is a full stack authentication and authorization platform, whose APIs make it simple to seamlessly onboard, authenticate and engage users. Improve security and user experience by going passwordless.

item.title: Bookstash - Get the essentials of top books in under 3 minutes

item.content:encoded: Bookstash is a free library of curated summaries from top nonfiction books. We pick a book for you and give you all the key ideas and you get to save your favorites for later & track your reading progress.

item.title: AltCoffee - Give people a way to say thanks with crypto
item.description: It's basically a crypto version of buy me a coffee.
item.content:encoded: It's basically a crypto version of buy me a coffee.

item.title: The Cold Start Problem - A book about how to start and scale network effects
item.description: Based on 100s of interviews with founding teams at Twitch, Tinder, Uber, Airbnb, Pinterest, and many more, Andrew Chen explores how tech‚Äôs most successful companies solved the dreaded "cold start problem‚Äù using network effects to launch and scale.
item.content:encoded: Based on 100s of interviews with founding teams at Twitch, Tinder, Uber, Airbnb, Pinterest, and many more, Andrew Chen explores how tech‚Äôs most successful companies solved the dreaded "cold start problem‚Äù using network effects to launch and scale.

item.title: Link in Bio - Link in bio tool with video, built in no-code
item.description: One page for all your links with a video. Claim a unique URL and share in your bio. Add your links, pick your theme and you're good to go. All built in no-code: Webflow + Bubble in 4 weeks.
item.content:encoded: One page for all your links with a video. Claim a unique URL and share in your bio. Add your links, pick your theme and you're good to go. All built in no-code: Webflow + Bubble in 4 weeks.

item.title: Matrix Playground - A glimpse inside the Matrix
item.description: At Spline, we love the Matrix so we built a fun side project for everyone to play around! You can upload your 3d models, see yourself inside Matrix code using the webcam, and change the parameters of the particles.
item.content:encoded: At Spline, we love the Matrix so we built a fun side project for everyone to play around! You can upload your 3d models, see yourself inside Matrix code using the webcam, and change the parameters of the particles.

item.title: Patchstack - Patch your WordPress stack
item.description: Monitor all your WordPress sites for security vulnerabilities found by our community of ethical hackers. Add up to 99 websites for free!
item.content:encoded: Monitor all your WordPress sites for security vulnerabilities found by our community of ethical hackers. Add up to 99 websites for free!

item.title: Gentler - Support long-term wellbeing by knowing your activity levels
item.description: Knowing your activity levels and having them guide your active life lowers the chances of fatigue, burnout, injury. Gentler monitors your fitness progress and nudges you to slow down, step up, or rest. It is personalized, appropriate for all fitness levels.
item.content:encoded: Knowing your activity levels and having them guide your active life lowers the chances of fatigue, burnout, injury. Gentler monitors your fitness progress and nudges you to slow down, step up, or rest. It is personalized, appropriate for all fitness levels.

item.title: CloudTalk for Mobile - Calling software for scaling sales and support teams

item.content:encoded: CloudTalk Go allows Sales, Support & Operation teams to stay connected and professionally handle customer calls outside of the office using WiFi or mobile networks. Available on the iOS App Store and the Android Play Store.

item.title: OpenScout by Landscape - Scout for multiple VCs, earn up to $50k for referrals
item.description: With OpenScout, investors can access diverse dealflow from handpicked scouts. Venture scouts can share deals with an entire marketplace of investors, and get paid a success fee ($5k-50k!). Apply to join as a scout or as an investor for our invite-only beta!
item.content:encoded: With OpenScout, investors can access diverse dealflow from handpicked scouts. Venture scouts can share deals with an entire marketplace of investors, and get paid a success fee ($5k-50k!). Apply to join as a scout or as an investor for our invite-only beta!

item.title: Fathom - Never take notes on a Zoom call again
item.description: Fathom records, transcribes, and replaces note taking with a click of a button on your Zoom calls, so you can simply focus on the conversation at hand. Easily share call highlights with your team via email, Slack, or auto-generated summaries sent to your CRM.

item.content:encoded: In-app NPS surveys with a non-intrusive, breakthrough respondent experience, powerful targeting capabilities and pre-built reports. Available for SaaS, Android and iOS apps, for free without any limitation on your number of users or the number of responses.

item.title: PeerSolver - Know how others solve their startup problems
item.description: Problem-solution pairs that tell you what works and what doesn't. These are the categories we tackle: * Ideation * Hiring * Leadership * Marketing * Getting investors * Time management * Idea validation * Market needs * Growth Hacking
item.content:encoded: Problem-solution pairs that tell you what works and what doesn't. These are the categories we tackle: * Ideation * Hiring * Leadership * Marketing * Getting investors * Time management * Idea validation * Market needs * Growth Hacking

item.description: AirTaste is the first dual-layer cookware that lets you cook nutritious meals effortlessly. Its chamber of air acts like the thick walls of a Dutch Oven ‚Äî but better, and lighter! ‚Äî heating food thoroughly and without burning, even if you don‚Äôt stir!
